nodes.text: The Art of Star Wars: Uprising

The Art of Star Wars: Uprising is a collection of various concept artworks and other material produced during the making of the canon video game Star Wars: Uprising, which was developed by Kabam. Although it is not available for public purchase, Ken Capelli, Kabam's Senior Creative Director, gifted several copies of the book to the members of WookieeProject Data Seekers, a WookieeProject focused on creating, upgrading and maintaining all articles related to Star Wars: Uprising.
